incantation.template: <<<<<<< SEARCH - [x] 2. Infuse the core logic with potent magic. ======= - [x] 2. Infuse the core logic with potent magic. - [ ] 2.1. **Reforging Mandate:** {a_precise_summary_of_the_flaw.} - {My exacting, detailed instructions for correcting the artifact.} >>>>>>> REPLACE
